meanings.sent1: The antibacklash gear system ensured smooth movement without any sudden jerks.
meanings.sent2: The engineer used an antibacklash technique to make the machine more precise.
meanings.sent3: The antibacklash adjustment on the camera made sure the photos were always clear.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as an antibacklash shield against his harsh words.
meanings.sent5: The special coating on the lens acted like an antibacklash barrier against scratches.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism designed to reduce backlash
meanings.sent1: The antibacklash in the machinery prevented any unnecessary movement.
meanings.sent2: The new antibacklash in the steering system made driving smoother.
meanings.sent3: The antibacklash in the door hinge stopped it from swinging back too far.
meanings.sent4: The antibacklash in the clock mechanism kept time accurately without delays.
meanings.sent5: The antibacklash in the fishing reel prevented the line from tangling.
